about_the_game:
Puzzle RPG where AI learns player's puzzles

A puzzle RPG game in which players help the Friends of BlockWorld, who have gone berserk with negative minds, while teaching puzzles to Hoshihabito-kun, a mysterious AI that learns how to solve puzzles.

Rules of Battle

When the puzzle starts, the number of the subject appears. Drag and move the blocks to swap the blocks.

Drag and drop the blocks to swap them. The number of the theme number will decrease by the number of blocks you move.

When the number in the puzzle reaches 0, the puzzle chain starts! When three identical blocks are matched, a chain starts!

Use SP to activate skills and special moves

As you progress through the puzzle, SP will accumulate. You can use SP to activate unique Friends skills and skills.

Stash them and release them for massive damage!

When you start a chain, BRAKER will be activated.

If you chain while BRAKER, you will charge an attack, and when the chain ends, you will release the BRAKER state and unleash an attack.

Puzzle Learning AI BLRS

The puzzle-learning Ai uses a unique system, BLRS, which can train the AI by learning how the player moves the puzzle and the results.

Furthermore, boss battles are fought by Hoshihabito-kun and other Friends who fight alongside the player, utilizing the BLRS learning data. Let's activate your skills and support your Friends!

highlighted.name: Became Best Friends with a Friend

name: BlockWorld Ai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 530 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: RPG puzzle game in which players train a mysterious AI, Hoshihabito-kun, who learns how to move puzzles and the results, and fight powerful bosses together with players
